summary: This is a forwarded email from the New York Daily News reporting that Jeffrey Epstein was found injured in his jail cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in Manhattan on July 24, 2019, with marks on his neck, in a possible suicide attempt.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the news report; found semi-conscious and injured in his jail cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in Manhattan.

persons.name: Eric Blachman
persons.context: The email is forwarded to his address at the U.S. Department of Justice (eric.blachman@usdoj.gov).

events.title: Epstein found injured in jail cell
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was found semi-conscious in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in Manhattan with marks on his neck that may have been self-inflicted, reported as a possible suicide attempt.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, Manhattan, New York, NY
New York Plaza, New York, NY 10004
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was found injured and semi-conscious in his jail cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in Manhattan on July 24, 2019.
The incident was reported as a possible suicide attempt, with marks found on Epstein's neck.
The information was reported by NBC News and disseminated via a New York Daily News breaking news email.
The email was forwarded to a U.S. Department of Justice email address (eric.blachman@usdoj.gov).
